program.name: grep
program.configure:
case "${SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-bnortllib -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib:/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z -Ae +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
rm -f config.cache CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" CPPFLAGS="-I${LIBPCRE_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${LIBPCRE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${LIBPCRE_LIB} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" ./configure \ ${LIBICONV+--with-libiconv-prefix=${LIBICONV}} \ --with-libintl-prefix=${GETTEXT} --datadir="${_datadir}" \ --disable-dependency-tracking --program-prefix=g \ --prefix=${INSTALL_PREFIX}

item.para: Don't fail if we don't have an stdout fd and -q is used (happens e.g. on calls from hotplug scripts)
Don't hang forever if fed with an empty string to grep for and --color enabled

item.screen: echo "1 one" | grep -E "[0-9]*" -o echo "1 one" | grep -E "[0-9]*" --color

note.para: GNU grep has been compiled with support for Perl regular expressions using the PCRE library.
